title: Aadhya Emerald & Diamond Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: Brilliant-cut Diamonds (8.13 carats) with VVS clarity
and genuine South Sea Pearls (21.30 carats).
features: This exquisite haaram features a floral design with oval-cut emeralds surrounded by a halo of dazzling diamonds. The intricate diamond work extends upward, creating a graceful collar. The necklace is finished with lustrous South Sea pearls delicately dangling from the lower edge, adding a touch of elegance and movement. Features a secure clasp.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Ideal for brides seeking a statement piece with a touch of tradition and contemporary flair. Also suitable for special occasions like seemantham or upscale cultural events.
description: This breathtaking haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of vibrant emeralds, sparkling diamonds, and lustrous South Sea pearls creates a piece of unparalleled beauty. The traditional design is infused with a modern sensibility, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship ensure that this haaram will be treasured for generations to come. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift for a loved one.
